name: Magic Siege Engine
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell permits an indirect fire siege engine to bombard its targets with greater accuracy, delivering more damage. The siege weapon receives a +1 enhancement bonus on targeting rolls and damage rolls. If used on a direct fire siege weapon, this spell acts a magic weapon.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
target_zh: 接触到的一台攻城器械
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效 (无害，物体)
text_zh:
魔化攻城器械法术可以让间接攻击的攻城武器更加准确的攻击，并提供更高伤害。

攻城武器获得+1增强加值在瞄准和伤害骰上。

如果本法术施放在一个近战攻击的攻城器械上，这个法术视同魔化武器。
